ps2.2:1.5.pli: ‘ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo’ti tathametaṃ avitathametaṃ anaññathametaṃ, ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodho’ti tathametaṃ avitathametaṃ anaññathametaṃ, ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti tathametaṃ avitathametaṃ anaññathametaṃ.

ps2.2:1.6.pli: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni”.

ps2.2:2.2.pli: Cattāro dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā.

ps2.2:2.4.pli: ime cattāro dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā.

ps2.2:3.2.pli: Cattāro samudayassa samudayaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā.

ps2.2:3.4.pli: ime cattāro samudayassa samudayaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā.

ps2.2:4.2.pli: Cattāro nirodhassa nirodhaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā.

ps2.2:4.4.pli: ime cattāro nirodhassa nirodhaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā.

ps2.2:5.2.pli: Cattāro maggassa maggaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā.

ps2.2:5.4.pli: ime cattāro maggassa maggaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā.

ps2.2:7.3.pli: Dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭho tathaṭṭho, samudayassa samudayaṭṭho tathaṭṭho, nirodhassa nirodhaṭṭho tathaṭṭho, maggassa maggaṭṭho tathaṭṭho—

ps2.2:7.4.pli: imehi catūhākārehi tathaṭṭhena cattāri saccāni ekasaṅgahitāni.

ps2.2:8.3.pli: Dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭho anattaṭṭho, samudayassa samudayaṭṭho anattaṭṭho, nirodhassa nirodhaṭṭho anattaṭṭho, maggassa maggaṭṭho anattaṭṭho—

ps2.2:8.4.pli: imehi catūhākārehi anattaṭṭhena cattāri saccāni ekasaṅgahitāni.

ps2.2:9.3.pli: Dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭho saccaṭṭho, samudayassa samudayaṭṭho saccaṭṭho, nirodhassa nirodhaṭṭho saccaṭṭho, maggassa maggaṭṭho saccaṭṭho—

ps2.2:9.4.pli: imehi catūhākārehi saccaṭṭhena cattāri saccāni ekasaṅgahitāni.

ps2.2:10.3.pli: Dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭho paṭivedhaṭṭho, samudayassa samudayaṭṭho paṭivedhaṭṭho nirodhassa nirodhaṭṭho paṭivedhaṭṭho, maggassa maggaṭṭho paṭivedhaṭṭho—

ps2.2:10.4.pli: imehi catūhākārehi paṭivedhaṭṭhena cattāri saccāni ekasaṅgahitāni yaṃ ekasaṅgahitaṃ taṃ ekattaṃ.

ps2.2:11.2.pli: Yaṃ aniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ dukkhaṃ taṃ aniccaṃ, yaṃ aniccañca dukkhañca taṃ anattā.

ps2.2:11.3.pli: Yaṃ aniccañca dukkhañca anattā ca taṃ tathaṃ.

ps2.2:11.4.pli: Yaṃ aniccaṃ ca dukkhañca anattā ca tathañca taṃ saccaṃ.

ps2.2:11.5.pli: Yaṃ aniccañca dukkhañca anattā ca tathañca saccañca taṃ ekasaṅgahitaṃ.

ps2.2:12.3.pli: Tathaṭṭhena, anattaṭṭhena, saccaṭṭhena, paṭivedhaṭṭhena, abhiññaṭṭhena, pariññaṭṭhena, pahānaṭṭhena, bhāvanaṭṭhena, sacchikiriyaṭṭhena—

ps2.2:13.3.pli: Dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭho tathaṭṭho, samudayassa samudayaṭṭho tathaṭṭho, nirodhassa nirodhaṭṭho tathaṭṭho, maggassa maggaṭṭho tathaṭṭho, abhiññāya abhiññaṭṭho tathaṭṭho, pariññāya pariññaṭṭho tathaṭṭho, pahānassa pahānaṭṭho tathaṭṭho, bhāvanāya bhāvanaṭṭho tathaṭṭho, sacchikiriyāya sacchikiriyaṭṭho tathaṭṭho—

ps2.2:13.4.pli: imehi navahākārehi tathaṭṭhena cattāri saccāni ekasaṅgahitāni.

ps2.2:14.5.pli: Dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭho paṭivedhaṭṭho, samudayassa samudayaṭṭho paṭivedhaṭṭho, nirodhassa nirodhaṭṭho paṭivedhaṭṭho, maggassa maggaṭṭho paṭivedhaṭṭho, abhiññāya abhiññaṭṭho paṭivedhaṭṭho, pariññāya pariññaṭṭho paṭivedhaṭṭho, pahānassa pahānaṭṭho paṭivedhaṭṭho, bhāvanāya bhāvanaṭṭho paṭivedhaṭṭho, sacchikiriyāya sacchikiriyaṭṭho paṭivedhaṭṭho—

ps2.2:14.6.pli: imehi navahākārehi paṭivedhaṭṭhena cattāri saccāni ekasaṅgahitāni.

ps2.2:15.3.pli: Tathaṭṭhena, anattaṭṭhena, saccaṭṭhena, paṭivedhaṭṭhena, abhijānanaṭṭhena, parijānanaṭṭhena, dhammaṭṭhena, tathaṭṭhena, ñātaṭṭhena, sacchikiriyaṭṭhena, phassanaṭṭhena, abhisamayaṭṭhena—

ps2.2:15.4.pli: imehi dvādasahi ākārehi cattāri saccāni ekasaṅgahitāni.

ps2.2:16.3.pli: Dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho, saṅkhataṭṭho, santāpaṭṭho, vipariṇāmaṭṭho, tathaṭṭho;

ps2.2:16.4.pli: samudayassa āyūhanaṭṭho, nidānaṭṭho, saṃyogaṭṭho, palibodhaṭṭho tathaṭṭho;

ps2.2:16.5.pli: nirodhassa nissaraṇaṭṭho, vivekaṭṭho, asaṅkhataṭṭho, amataṭṭho tathaṭṭho;

ps2.2:16.6.pli: maggassa niyyānaṭṭho, hetuṭṭho, dassanaṭṭho, ādhipateyyaṭṭho tathaṭṭho—

ps2.2:16.7.pli: imehi soḷasahi ākārehi tathaṭṭhena cattāri saccāni ekasaṅgahitāni.

ps2.2:17.12.pli: Soḷasahi ākārehi abhisamayaṭṭhena cattāri saccāni ekappaṭivedhāni.

ps2.2:17.13.pli: Dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho, saṅkhataṭṭho, santāpaṭṭho, vipariṇāmaṭṭho, abhisamayaṭṭho;

ps2.2:17.14.pli: samudayassa āyūhanaṭṭho, nidānaṭṭho, saṃyogaṭṭho, palibodhaṭṭho, abhisamayaṭṭho;

ps2.2:17.15.pli: nirodhassa nissaraṇaṭṭho, vivekaṭṭho, asaṅkhataṭṭho, amataṭṭho, abhisamayaṭṭho;

ps2.2:17.16.pli: maggassa niyyānaṭṭho, hetuṭṭho, dassanaṭṭho, ādhipateyyaṭṭho, abhisamayaṭṭho—

ps2.2:17.17.pli: imehi soḷasahi ākārehi abhisamayaṭṭhena cattāri saccāni ekasaṅgahitāni.

ps2.2:19.3.pli: Saṅkhatānaṃ saccānaṃ uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitānaṃ aññathattaṃ paññāyati asaṅkhatassa saccassa na uppādo paññāyati, na vayo paññāyati, na ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyati—

ps2.2:20.3.pli: Dukkhasaccassa uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyati;

ps2.2:20.4.pli: samudayasaccassa uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyati;

ps2.2:20.5.pli: maggasaccassa uppādo paññāyati, vayo paññāyati, ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyati;

ps2.2:20.6.pli: nirodhasaccassa na uppādo paññāyati, na vayo paññāyati, na ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyati—

ps2.2:21.1.pli: Catunnaṃ saccānaṃ kati kusalā, kati akusalā, kati abyākatā?

ps2.2:21.2.pli: Samudayasaccaṃ akusalaṃ, maggasaccaṃ kusalaṃ, nirodhasaccaṃ abyākataṃ.

ps2.2:21.3.pli: Dukkhasaccaṃ siyā kusalaṃ, siyā akusalaṃ, siyā abyākataṃ.

ps2.2:22.1.pli: Siyā tīṇi saccāni ekasaccena saṅgahitāni, ekasaccaṃ tīhi saccehi saṅgahitaṃ?

ps2.2:22.5.pli: evaṃ akusalaṭṭhena dve saccāni ekasaccena saṅgahitāni, ekasaccaṃ dvīhi saccehi saṅgahitaṃ.

ps2.2:22.7.pli: evaṃ kusalaṭṭhena dve saccāni ekasaccena saṅgahitāni, ekasaccaṃ dvīhi saccehi saṅgahitaṃ.

ps2.2:22.9.pli: evaṃ abyākataṭṭhena dve saccāni ekasaccena saṅgahitāni, ekasaccaṃ dvīhi saccehi saṅgahitaṃ.

ps2.2:22.10.pli: Evaṃ siyā tīṇi saccāni ekasaccena saṅgahitāni, ekasaccaṃ tīhi saccehi saṅgahitaṃ vatthuvasena pariyāyenāti.

ps2.2:23.1.pli: “Pubbe me, bhikkhave, sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi—

ps2.2:23.2.pli: ‘ko nu kho rūpassa assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṃ nissaraṇaṃ;

ps2.2:23.3.pli: ko vedanāya assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṃ nissaraṇaṃ;

ps2.2:23.4.pli: ko saññāya assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṃ nissaraṇaṃ;

ps2.2:23.5.pli: ko saṅkhārānaṃ assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṃ nissaraṇaṃ;

ps2.2:23.6.pli: ko viññāṇassa assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṃ nissaraṇan’ti?

ps2.2:23.8.pli: ‘yaṃ kho rūpaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ—

ps2.2:23.10.pli: Yaṃ rūpaṃ aniccaṃ, taṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ—

ps2.2:23.17.pli: yaṃ viññāṇaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ—

ps2.2:23.19.pli: Yaṃ viññāṇaṃ aniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ—

ps2.2:24.1.pli: Yāvakīvañcāhaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ evaṃ assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṃ nābbhaññāsiṃ, neva tāvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ‘anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṃ yato ca khvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ evaṃ assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ, athāhaṃ, bhikkhave, ‘sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṃ.

ps2.2:25.1.pli: Yaṃ rūpaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ rūpassa assādoti—

ps2.2:25.3.pli: Yaṃ rūpaṃ aniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, ayaṃ rūpassa ādīnavoti—

ps2.2:25.5.pli: Yo rūpasmiṃ chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṃ, idaṃ rūpassa nissaraṇanti—

ps2.2:25.7.pli: Yā imesu tīsu ṭhānesu diṭṭhi saṅkappo vācā kammanto ājīvo vāyāmo sati samādhi—

ps2.2:26.4.pli: yaṃ viññāṇaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ viññāṇassa assādoti—

ps2.2:26.6.pli: Yaṃ viññāṇaṃ aniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, ayaṃ viññāṇassa ādīnavoti—

ps2.2:26.8.pli: Yo viññāṇasmiṃ chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṃ, idaṃ viññāṇassa nissaraṇanti—

ps2.2:26.10.pli: Yā imesu tīsu ṭhānesu diṭṭhi saṅkappo vācā kammanto ājīvo vāyāmo sati samādhi—

ps2.2:27.8.pli: Jarāmaraṇañca pajānāti, jarāmaraṇasamudayañca pajānāti, jarāmaraṇanirodhañca pajānāti, jarāmaraṇanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadañca pajānāti—

ps2.2:28.5.pli: Jātiñca pajānāti, jātisamudayañca pajānāti, jātinirodhañca pajānāti, jātinirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadañca pajānāti—

ps2.2:29.5.pli: Bhavaṃ ca pajānāti, bhavasamudayañca pajānāti, bhavanirodhañca pajānāti, bhavanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadañca pajānāti—

ps2.2:30.5.pli: Upādānañca pajānāti, upādānasamudayañca pajānāti, upādānanirodhañca pajānāti upādānanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadañca pajānāti—

ps2.2:31.5.pli: Taṇhañca pajānāti, taṇhāsamudayañca pajānāti, taṇhānirodhañca pajānāti, taṇhānirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadañca pajānāti—

ps2.2:32.5.pli: Vedanañca pajānāti, vedanāsamudayañca pajānāti, vedanānirodhañca pajānāti, vedanānirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadañca pajānāti—

ps2.2:33.5.pli: Phassañca pajānāti, phassasamudayañca pajānāti, phassanirodhañca pajānāti, phassanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadañca pajānāti—

ps2.2:34.5.pli: Saḷāyatanañca pajānāti, saḷāyatanasamudayañca pajānāti, saḷāyatananirodhañca pajānāti, saḷāyatananirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadañca pajānāti—

ps2.2:35.5.pli: Nāmarūpañca pajānāti, nāmarūpasamudayañca pajānāti, nāmarūpanirodhañca pajānāti, nāmarūpanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadañca pajānāti—

ps2.2:36.5.pli: Viññāṇañca pajānāti, viññāṇasamudayañca pajānāti, viññāṇanirodhañca pajānāti, viññāṇanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadañca pajānāti—

ps2.2:37.5.pli: Saṅkhāre ca pajānāti, saṅkhārasamudayañca pajānāti, saṅkhāranirodhañca pajānāti, saṅkhāranirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadañca pajānāti—

ps2.2:38.1.pli: Jarāmaraṇaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ, jāti samudayasaccaṃ, ubhinnampi nissaraṇaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ, nirodhappajānanā maggasaccaṃ.

ps2.2:38.2.pli: Jāti dukkhasaccaṃ, bhavo samudayasaccaṃ, ubhinnampi nissaraṇaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ, nirodhappajānanā maggasaccaṃ.

ps2.2:38.3.pli: Bhavo dukkhasaccaṃ, upādānaṃ samudayasaccaṃ, ubhinnampi nissaraṇaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ, nirodhappajānanā maggasaccaṃ.

ps2.2:38.4.pli: Upādānaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ, taṇhā samudayasaccaṃ, ubhinnampi nissaraṇaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ, nirodhappajānanā maggasaccaṃ.

ps2.2:38.5.pli: Taṇhā dukkhasaccaṃ, vedanā samudayasaccaṃ, ubhinnampi nissaraṇaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ, nirodhappajānanā maggasaccaṃ.

ps2.2:38.6.pli: Vedanā dukkhasaccaṃ, phasso samudayasaccaṃ, ubhinnampi nissaraṇaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ, nirodhappajānanā maggasaccaṃ.

ps2.2:38.7.pli: Phasso dukkhasaccaṃ, saḷāyatanaṃ samudayasaccaṃ, ubhinnampi nissaraṇaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ, nirodhappajānanā maggasaccaṃ.

ps2.2:38.8.pli: Saḷāyatanaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ, nāmarūpaṃ samudayasaccaṃ, ubhinnampi nissaraṇaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ, nirodhappajānanā maggasaccaṃ.

ps2.2:38.9.pli: Nāmarūpaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ, viññāṇaṃ samudayasaccaṃ, ubhinnampi nissaraṇaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ, nirodhappajānanā maggasaccaṃ.

ps2.2:38.10.pli: Viññāṇaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ, saṅkhārā samudayasaccaṃ, ubhinnampi nissaraṇaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ, nirodhappajānanā maggasaccaṃ.

ps2.2:38.11.pli: Saṅkhārā dukkhasaccaṃ, avijjā samudayasaccaṃ, ubhinnampi nissaraṇaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ, nirodhappajānanā maggasaccaṃ.

ps2.2:39.1.pli: Jarāmaraṇaṃ siyā dukkhasaccaṃ, siyā samudayasaccaṃ, ubhinnampi nissaraṇaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ, nirodhappajānanā maggasaccaṃ.

ps2.2:39.3.pli: bhavo siyā dukkhasaccaṃ, siyā samudayasaccaṃ, ubhinnampi nissaraṇaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ, nirodhappajānanā maggasaccanti.
